assessment_item.title: ಭಾರತದ ದೂರದರ್ಶನ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ‘ಅಧಿಪತ್ಯ ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ ರಾಣಿ’ ಎಂದೇ ಹೆಸರು ಮಾಡಿದವರು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಭಾರತದ ದೂರದರ್ಶನ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ‘ಅಧಿಪತ್ಯ ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ ರಾಣಿ’ ಎಂದೇ ಹೆಸರು ಮಾಡಿದವರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಅಜೀಂ ಪ್ರೇಮ್‍ಜಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5542"},{"text":"

 ಕಿರಣ್ ಮುಜಮ್‍ದಾರ್ ಷಾ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5543"},{"text":"

ಏಕ್ತಾ ಕಪೂರ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:5553"},{"text":"

ಧೀರು ಭಾಯಿ ಅಂಬಾನಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5558"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಭಾರತದ ದೂರದರ್ಶನ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ‘ಅಧಿಪತ್ಯ ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ ರಾಣಿ’ ಎಂದೇ ಹೆಸರು ಮಾಡಿದವರು ","title":"ಭಾರತದ ದೂರದರ್ಶನ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ‘ಅಧಿಪತ್ಯ ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ ರಾಣಿ’ ಎಂದೇ ಹೆಸರು ಮಾಡಿದವರು ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
